content: a further 2 3 3 4 4 times 48 52 56 60 sts all heel sts have been worked 16 16 18 18 round 2 knit 20 heel sts remain round 3 *k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 slm repeat from * once more 4 sts gusset decrease begin working in the round again as follows repeat last 2 rounds a further 6 7 7 8 9 times set-up round sl1 k15 15 17 17 19 pick up 28 32 32 36 40 sts decrease 16 16 20 20 20 and knit 12 sts along edge of heel flap 1 st in sts remain each slipped st along edge of the flap k24 cut yarn leaving a 30cm 12in tail graft sts 26 28 30 32 across instep sts pick up and together using kitchener stitch weave in knit 12 sts along edge of heel flap k28 28 30 ends 30 32 place marker for new start of round at start of instep sts 64 66 70 72 76 sts round 1 k 24 26 28 30 32 ssk knit to 2 sts before end of round k2tog 2 sts decrease round 2 knit last 2 rounds set gusset decreases repeat these 2 rounds a further 7 6 6 5 5 times 16 14 14 12 12 sts decrease 48 52 56 60 64 sts remain you should now have 24 26 28 30 32 sts each on instep and sole foot work in st st as set until the sock measures 4 5 5 5 6 6 cm 1 75 2 2 2 25 2 25 in less than the desired foot length ©rachel coopey 2017 2� http //www coopknits co uk/ email coopknit@gmail com
